tagline.message: A charting and data visualization library for Unity.

feature1.desc.message: XCharts was designed from the outset to be easy to install and use in Unity for creating charts.

feature2.desc.message: XCharts supports line, bar, pie, radar, scatter, heatmap, ring, candlestick, polar, parallel coordinates,3d line, 3d pie, 3d bar, 3d pyramid, funnel, gauge, liquid, pictorialbar, gantt, treemap, sankey and graph chart.

feature3.desc.message: XCharts offers a variety of components and configurations, allowing you to achieve the desired chart effects by simply and quickly adjusting the configurations.
